Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Conclusively \Con*clu"sive*ly\, adv. In the way of conclusion; decisively; positively. --Burke. [1913 Webster]
conclusively adv : in a conclusive way; "we settled the problem conclusively" [syn: {once and for all}] [ant: {inconclusively}]
